text.headline: Cricket Replaces Golf
text.text:
Cox Bazar currently had 9 holes in play. The property is in southeastern Bangladesh. The golf course was designed by Paul Jansen. Jansen has been a longtime design associate for Nick Faldo Deisgn. Turfgrass choice was paspalum.

Cricket has replaced the golf course as the grounds have been leased out to construction of a new stadium.
